Summary: 2 people witness blue,red opalesant lights hovering the east mtns. above austin lights UFO was still standing for about ten minutes and quickly within 2 seconds disappeared up into the sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Austin
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details1\16\10 at approximately 2:45 am, two adults out camping within the toyabe national park. we were 15 miles south of the town of austin nevada. my honey and i noticed for approximately 10 minutes an object we could not identify it was hovering with lights that were opalesant in various colors blue red and greens. stayed still lights seemed to be changing fast. at the time of 2:45 am my honey went outside of our tent trailer to get me a soft drink and noticed the object in the sky. the next morning we noticed something in our tent trailer that could not be explained as to how it got there. the larger of our beds in the tent trailer had become very wet and had a large 24 inch circumfance of being wet and could not be explained on how it happened. it was a creppy feeling out there in no where land and could not explain the incident. all i know is i was uneasy and i was spooked.
